It appears it will be released later than predicted, on July 11th (22 countries).  8GB $199, 16GB $299.  GPS functionality included.

That's my bi-monthly post, see you in August (heh)

...but it's possible if...

1) CAR wins both of their remaining games (DAL and @TAM) = CAR 8-8 record
2) WAS wins @MIN and loses vs DAL = WAS 8-8 record -> CAR wins conf tiebreaker on NFC record
3) MIN loses vs WAS and @DEN = MIN 8-8 record -> CAR wins conf tiebreaker on NFC record
4) NO loses either vs PHI or @CHI = NO 8-8 record -> CAR wins div tiebreaker on strength of schedule

...it can happen :P

Hehehe I gots a candy.

Apple has decided to issue a recall on their laptop batteries, affecting the 12" iBook G4, and 12" and 15" Powerbook G4s.  They are manufactured by Sony, who made the Dell exploding batteries :P

https://support.apple.com/ibook_powerbook/batteryexchange/

If you have one of those models check the site out.

(and agh the High School I support has... about 100 iBooks to check :\  )
Maybe they'll start making little tree air fresheners that smell like this...

I'll be giving this a try and posting opinions on it throughout the coming days... if you are brave enough to give it a try, you can DL it here:

http://www.microsoft.com/windows/ie/ie7/default.mspx

http://elgoog.rb-hosting.de/index.cgi

It's Google in a mirror!

Remember you also have to put your search term in backwards :P
Whee, wind gusts 60-80+ MPH blew billboards, road signs, trees, etc. away last night @_@
Have a safe and merry Christmas!!! :D
Hello! ;)  Please reply :P  Else I will be sad. :(

Happy thanksgiving everyone :) 

(if you don't celebrate thanksgiving, Happy 4th Thursday in November!)

DSL was out all day yesterday.  Stupid me never got around to getting the dial-up backup numbers beforehand. :\

So, heh, that's where I was yesterday.

My LiveJournal Trick-or-Treat Haul
Leuqarte goes trick-or-treating, dressed up as Leuqie devil.
5exy515 tricks you! You get a moldy pretzel.
bbarden gives you 18 light yellow watermelon-flavoured gumdrops.
bri_baby tricks you! You lose 15 pieces of candy!
erdufylla gives you 5 brown coconut-flavoured gummy fruits.
ian_munroe gives you 4 blue lemon-flavoured hard candies.
oltri gives you 2 yellow licorice-flavoured pieces of chewing gum.
scrawnysquall gives you 2 pink lemon-flavoured hard candies.
tux_rose gives you 11 light yellow blueberry-flavoured pieces of bubblegum.
x_jenn_x gives you 15 orange banana-flavoured gummy bats.
zillah3 tricks you! You get a thumbtack.
Leuqarte ends up with 42 pieces of candy, a moldy pretzel, and a thumbtack.
Go trick-or-treating! Username:
Another fun meme brought to you by rfreebern.
I woulda shared my candy now, Bri :P hehe *tacks moldy pretzel to wall and eats remaining candy*

I have now purchased the last component for my computer, and I should be up and running by the end of the week :D

Pentium 4, 3.06 GHz HT Processor @ $270, free 3day FedEx.

Yaay :D I didn't want to go six months with a dead box :o

Staples bowling outing #2:
110, 93, 115, and a solo speedbowl of 100 :P

And the Panthers came through again *yaay*

Another long gap between entries, I know.  

*thinks up excuse*

O yeah!  <lj-cut text="My excuse...">I was out of town ;)  Out of state even :P  I was at Ani-Magic in Lancaster, CA last weekend, had a great time.  It was fun getting to meet you, <lj user="5exy515">, <lj user="bri_baby">, <lj user="scrawnysquall">, <lj user="x_jenn_x">, and others I don't currently have on my friends list (I can add you if you want, just reply ;)  )

<lj user="sailorunicorn"> and I drove up to Morgan Hill afterwards and net up with another friend, checked out apartments, went up to the newly-renovated mall in San Jose (quite nice, I must say), and then up to San Francisco (brrr!)  before flying back to Charlotte late Wednesday.</lj-cut>

Job news: I'm working on a promotion to department manager (officially, "Business Machines Specialist") at Staples here in Mooresville.  I've already started doing specialisty duties, and getting a little more training - meaning, they are going to work me quite a bit the next couple of weeks :P

More to come as these stories develop ;)

My journal says I'm 50% masculine.
What does your LJ writing style say about your gender?
LJ Gender Tool by
What exactly do I write in these things, anyway? *looks* ah, nothing! heh.

Hurricane Isabel is on it's way, it'll be here tomorrow @_@ http://www.weather.com/maps/news/atlstorm13/isabelcurrentposition_large.html

As far inland as I am, we won't get more than a few showers, around 35MPH winds tops

<lj user="erdufylla">, hang tight, you will be getting a little more :o  Don't worry too much though, it's only a cat 2 now and you are still pretty well inland :)

Livejournal changed the login page!  

Eh, if I don't like it in three days, I'll change it back :P

My LiveJournal Sitcom
Leuqarte And rat (UPN, 7:00): Leuqarte (Kevin Bacon) and scrawnysquall (Chris Rock) go waterskiing. Upstairs, 5exy515 (Edward Norton)'s office's air conditioning is broken, and lucias (Will Rogers) shows up to fix it. The week after, zillah3 (Leelee Sobieski) burns sa4turn3 (Adam West)'s bagel. On the other side of town, friendsofsj (Angelina Jolie) falls off supermoo3000 (Vivica Fox)'s porch and gets hurt. That same day, ian_munroe (W.C. Fields) eats bri_baby (Ed Asner)'s raspberry cheesecake. Hilarious results follow.
What's Your LiveJournal Sitcom? (by rfreebern)

Ugh! My car died last Friday @_@ I'll have it towed tomorrow to the garage, we'll have to see how much the job costs :\ I checked NAPA online, so far I've ruled out the empty fuel tank heh heh. *kicks car* How many pirates can fit in a Subway shop? 30. Plus three people in horse costumes. If it weren't for Dave Letterman, we'd never have this tidbit of knowledge to tuck away ;)

Should I add myself to my friends list?  If I do, is there a benefit to it?

Also, um, once I do, can I talk to myself?

There's going to be about 10 people doing that once they see a post, by ME, on their friends pages :o  I haven't made an entry to my journal since the end of May! (Although I haven't left other journals alone hehe)

I miss my computer :(

Anyways, everything has been... the same... since then.  With the exception of an AIM-less few nights recently.

What should I talk about?
  ==>Work
  ==>Computer progress
  ==>Random stuff, like what's on TV
  ==>Post a quiz!
  ==>It was nice and quiet before Leuq came back! And I miss that! ;P

Well, if the urge strikes, I will return :P

LJ Barcode
LJ username:

I think I've been computerless for three weeks now.  

I need three parts to be back in business:

$101 - Motherboard (the part that actually died)
$206 (from $236) - Processor (because the old one won't fit a new MB :o  )
~$70 - Memory (also because the old stuff won't work, and it would be a bottleneck if it did)
total right now, approximately $377.  Ouch.

But I do have the motherboard on the way now :D and the processor price keeps dropping so by the time I save up enough for that it may be under $200 :D

I realize I haven't posted here in a month.  hehe oops :\

(oanda.com if you have no idea how a US$ compares to your country's currency, hehe)

One of the requirements of my job is adding-on service and replacement plans on electronics equipment.  I'm on a roll this week, I have 6 after three days.  If I get at least 11 by thursday, the sales manager has to buy me lunch >:)

In other news, I just feel so darned good today.

:) 

I feel things are looking up for the next year of my life :D

*yawn*

Just wanted to let you know. :o

Yep, that's what the router did. *grrrr*

Hmm, I suppose 4 days is still under warranty. :\

Blaine ~ Blain ~ (Old English) ~ meaning ~ Flaming ~ motivation ~ A strong desire to protect those dear ~ character ~ A person of noble character ~ feelings ~ An emotional person ~ intelligence ~ Has an enquiring mind ~ spiritual ~ Is often guided by instinct ~ nature ~ Is caring and considerate ~ inherent ~ A person who lives life to its fullest Thin vs. flaming hehe. Everything else is the same :D
It's time to kick back and relax, as I have another day off from work! :D edit: oh yeah... hello !
